website_summaries.verdict: Part of a collection for a matching beach décor.
pros: Solid mahogany frames with lower shelf for storage
White color is nicely weathered with a slight grayish tint
cons: Planked top is heavy causing difficulty during assembly

customer_reviews.title: Solid coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coffee table. Really great quality, solid wood. Like something you would find at Pier 1 imports or Pottery barn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table perfect for beach house.
customer_reviews.text: A good looking table for our beach home. Creamy white with a slightly distressed look. Feels a bit like plastic to the touch although it is very heavy and has a nice wood grain. Good value but I was thankful our handyman was at the house with a full set of tools which speeded up assembly. I would say will not mark up easily as it’s not real wood, which is good for our casual environment.
customer_reviews.author: David Julian Martin

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the rear to assemble, NOT white
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t call this white, it’s more of a cream. Instructions are vague and had to take apart and put back together 3x. Took 2 hours to assemble. Aside from the color, the table is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sstpeters

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHITE IN COLOR. They are cream
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in the color! It’s not white it’s cream. Took away yo long to assemble! Need small hands and with the tiny tool they provide it’s makes it difficult! I’m more unhappy with the color. The pictures show a white table and these are cream. I may just send them back!
customer_reviews.author: Derek G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one sturdy, thick table!! It’s going to be around a long time. The pictures don’t do it justice. It fits right in with my beachy decor. It has the appearance of painted wood without the flaking of the paint or wood. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: conchanna

customer_reviews.title: Not white at all. Very yellow cream color
customer_reviews.text: It’s not white like the reviews say. It’s very yellow cream color Doesn’t look or feel like wood. Feels and looks like faux plastic wood but that’s not nessisarily bad because it feels like it won’t scratch .. feels like hard plastic but comes with a laundry list of “do nots”
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I put this together last night by myself. Only tool needed was a Phillips screwdriver. Very easy, great instructions, took about an hour and a half or a little more. Looks great, very sturdy. I highly recommend. If my opinion changes after use, I’ll comment again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough wonderful things about this table. It is a good heavy sturdy table and I had it together in about 45 minutes. It Is beautiful!! I had it one day early as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Blackwell

customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this coffee table! It is very sturdy and has the beach look I wanted
customer_reviews.author: belinda colvin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for less money. Buy it. You won't regret it Just dont expect for a white white cuz it is more of cream shade.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product
customer_reviews.text: Product is not as "white" as the picture shows, more of an off white kind of color. Bolts/nuts are not the easiest to tighten since they small wrench given is a pain to get maneuvered into the space provided. Product overall is sturdy, does not feel cheap but was disappointed with the color.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It’s exactly what I wanted to create my beach house look living room.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Its beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful table, easy enough to assemble. Could you please use better packaging materials. The styrofoam it comes with is a joke. Haven't even taken out of the box and it's making a big mess. Spend same amount assembling it as cleaning up. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tito Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good but Cream color not white
customer_reviews.text: Its a CREAM color...absolutely not white. A challenge to assemble but overall good deal
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Scialpi

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite piece of furniture. It completes the room!
customer_reviews.author: Boltzia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. The quality is great the finish is beautiful and goes great in my lake house.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome, sturdy table. It is NOT bright white, it is more cream colored-which worked better for me actually. Also it is a bear to assemble with the tool they provide, but once someone helped me with personal tools, it was super sturdy and very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than the photo!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy table. Very well made and so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: DaKaHoski

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This table is great. Very sturdy no issues with appearance. All parts were included. Heavy/ well made
customer_reviews.author: Katlin Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Well built, easy to put together and looks great...what else could you ask for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assemble kind of hard so take your time and read the instructions.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful table , perfect for my leaving room 😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Indu Kharel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly in my living room. It really is a slightly off white white gray brush marks around it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremie H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this furniture for our lake house!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and very well made for the price. We were pretty surprised! I’d definitely recommmend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, zero complaints
customer_reviews.text: I really like this piece. It’s exactly as advertised. Very sturdy, well made. Assembly took about an hour and wasn’t difficult. The reviews are correct in that it’s not a bright white more of a cream with grain detail. I have a combination of cream and white in my room already so it was perfect. It’s the perfect size to put feet up or play a board game. Package came a week early!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice, solid coffee table
customer_reviews.text: This unit is really solid and has a nice consistent thick coat of paint. The grain is very subtle and it looks really cool and contemporary. The less positive thing is the height is just a little short and assembly will take no less than 1 and 1/2 hours or more - requiring a good bit of patience. It's a little pricey for pre-fabricated furniture, but will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: jp39042

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coffee table, it’s very nice and sturdy. Wasn’t hard to assemble at all. Took about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Rivera

product_meta.title: Seaside Lodge White Coffee Table by Home Styles
product_meta.description: Rustic aged look of weathered wood combined with signature “X” frame pattern provides a warm inviting cottage feel. Wire brushed wainscot inset mahogany veneer panels, with wire brushed solid mahogany frames, provide a unique weather look, and then combined with a hand rubbed white painted finish, provides a completely aged look, with no 2 pieces being the same. Wide frame, plank top design, with lower shelf for storage. Note finish and measurements may vary slightly. Assembly required. W-36” D-36”, H-18”
feature_bullets: Hand rubbed white painted finish, Wire brushed Rustic Aged look of Weathered Wood
Wide frame, plank top design, with lower shelf for storage
Signature “X” Frame Pattern Provides a Warm Inviting Cottage Feel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars62 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
